data.message: Hi I have been trying to find a telephone number to contact you guys.  I am being charged every month and I DO NOT KNOW WHAT IT IS FOR.   These are monthly charges that I JUST NOTICED ON MY BANKING STATEMENT.   PLEASE CALL ME OR TEXT ME OR DO SOMETHING because I am tired of being charged by you people for something that I do not have...... The telephone number on the statement from my bank SAYS IT DOES NOT WORK...... WHAT IS THE MYSTERY?  WHY CAN'T I REACH YOU PEOPLE ABOUT THIS!

replies.message: Hey Angel. We hear your frustration. Would you please send us a private message? We'd like to collect more information about what you're experiencing. -Jordan
Well apparently you are now ignoring me since I sent you a private message over 24 hours ago!  Are you going to bother to respond or are you guys just going to keep stealing my money!
Hi Angel. Please check your inbox. We responded to your message. -Jordan
